Oh, I see. Thanks :)
sudo dd if=/dev/zero of=/dev/sda bs=1M, where sda is whatever your harddrive actually is, and 1M is the block size (and you can tinker with it to see what value of bs is fastest)
thanks, anyway to determine which bs is fastest or just guess?
There probably is, but I ended up just running 1K, 10K, 100K, 1M, 10M, 100M, etc., for about 20 seconds each and choosing the largest.
choosing the fastest **
